verses.roman:
kona bhāgye kona jīvera 'śraddhā' yadi haya
tabe sei jīva 'sādhu-saṅga' ye karaya

synonyms: kona bhāgye—by some good fortune; kona jīvera—of some living entity; śraddhā yadi haya—if there is faith; tabe—then; sei jīva—that living entity; sādhu-saṅga—association with devotees; ye—certainly; karaya—makes.
translation: "If, by good fortune, a living entity develops faith in Kṛṣṇa, he begins to associate with devotees.
